BatchAddClientNodes.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: goosefs.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: BatchAddClientNodes
<公共请求参数>

{
    "FileSystemId": "x_c60_r3c4fa1f",
    "SingleClusterFlag": false,
    "ClientNodes": [
        {
            "InstanceId": "ins-m1r9uwdp",
            "VpcId": "vpc-5ke3uoww",
            "SubnetId": "subnet-ihijdp5h",
            "LinuxClientNodeIp": "10.0.1.2"
        }
    ]
}
BatchAddClientNodes.title: 批量添加客户端节点

BatchDeleteClientNodes.input:

BatchDeleteClientNodes.title: 批量删除客户端节点

CreateDataRepositoryTask.document: 创建上传文件系统数据到存储桶任务
CreateDataRepositoryTask.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: goosefs.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreateDataRepositoryTask
<公共请求参数>

{
    "TaskName": "my_test_task",
    "FileSystemId": "x_c60_r3c4fa1f",
    "Bucket": "mybucket-1250000",
    "TaskPath": "aaa/bbb",
    "TaskType": "FS_TO_BUCKET",
    "RepositoryType": "MSP_AFM"
}
CreateDataRepositoryTask.title: 创建上传文件系统数据到存储桶任务
